mapper.insert: insert into challenge (ch_category, ch_title, ch_title_photo, ch_content, ch_deposit, ch_exphoto1, ch_exphoto2) values (#{ch_category}, #{ch_title}, #{ch_title_photo}, #{ch_content}, #{ch_deposit}, #{ch_exphoto1}, #{ch_exphoto2} )
